meanings.definition: A woman who sews, especially as a hobby or profession.
meanings.sent1: The needlewomen in the village create beautiful quilts.
meanings.sent2: Many needlewomen enjoy making their own clothes.
meanings.sent3: The needlewomen had a sewing competition to see who could thread a needle the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was the needlewomen of the family, always stitching things together.
meanings.sent5: The needlewomen's hands moved swiftly, turning fabric into works of art.

meanings.sent1: The shop employed several needlewomen to keep up with demand.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of talented needlewomen at the sewing convention.
meanings.sent3: The needlewomen gathered every Friday for a stitching circle.
meanings.sent4: In the tale, the needlewomen magically brought the torn fabric back together.
meanings.sent5: The needlewomen's creations filled the room with color and patterns.
